content.rendered:
Directed by April Mullen. David Wellington. Melanie Orr. Joyce Wong. Douglas Mitchell.

Written by Jennica Harper. Jason Ip. Alan McCullough. Jessie Gabe. Rosa Laborde. Evany Rosen. Nathalie Younglai. Jenn Engels.

Cast Stacey Farber (Darby Spencer 1). Thomas Antony Olajide (Zane Graham). Rodrigo Massa (Antonio Pereira). Ayesha Mansur Gonsalves (Sarita Stark). Adam Hurtig (Detective Harris). Jake Kennerd (Danny Moreau). Dutchess Cayetano (Olivia). Kaitlyn Leeb (Lindsay Yip). Taylor Jackson (Hannah). Nancy Sorel (Marlina Briggs). Edward Ruttle (Lucas Collins). Jennifer Hui (Kaia). Lisa Marie DiGiacinto (Noelle Briggs). Paul Essiembre (Jake Nardini). Mercedes Morris (Esme). Imali Perera (Monica). Lam An (Gala Attendee). Reece Presley (Jesse France). Andrea del Campo (Andrea Briggs). Julius Cho (Clark Chau). Derek Kun (Darby’s Dad (Sam Spencer)). Jason Wishnowski (Paul). Steve Pacaud (Store Owner). Sam Wexler (Chase). Diana Botelho-Urbanski (Tanya). Kevin McIntyre (Detective O’Neill). Bela Gyarmati (Produce Store Owner). Randy Apostle (Security Guard). Robbie Ambrosio (Link Estate Worker). Kamal Chioua (Brendon). Cindy Sampson (Candace Montgomery). Erik Athavale (Oscar). Gino Anania (Derek Wilkies). Zarrin Darnell-Martin (Karina Lewis). Henriette Ivanans (Auctioneer). Summer H. Howell (Jasmin/Epe). Matt Wells (Alex Larson). John B. Lowe (Brock Duhaime). Michael Strickland (Ian). Sarah Luby (Chloe). Moses Suzuki (Bernard). Alec Carlos (Ray). Angela Narth (Zelda Hoffman). Carolina Campos (Maria). Chelsea Rankin (Eliza). Nazariy Demkowicz (Atticus). Dan De Jaeger (Jed Weight). Glenn Odero (Daniel). Ward Keith (Hospital patient (uncredited))

Language English.

Producers Brent Crowell. Jennica Harper. Alan McCullough. Jennifer Beasley. Jenn Engels. Phyllis Laing. April Mullen. Evany Rosen. Nathalie Younglai. Tashi Bieler. Jessie Gabe. Jocelyn Hamilton.

Production Buffalo Gal Pictures. Entertainment One.

No. of Seasons 1

No. of Episodes 10

Status OnGoing (2023–)
